website_summaries.verdict: Four filtration systems work together to remove contaminants, heavy metals, and harmful chemicals.
pros: Filtration includes: Medical Grade hollow fiber UF membrane, coconut shell activated carbon, beads and medical grade PP Cotton
Bottle made from BPA-free food grade Tritan copolyester
cons: Filter can become impervious, and difficult to draw water through

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my trip to India..I filtered all my bottled water even...& Was one of a few that never felt ill
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: wonderful drinking quality
customer_reviews.text: I looked around the internet for a while for a viable way to purify water.Finally,I choose this filterted water bottle. I had this bottle for servals days now and it is wonderful. It feels good knowing that you are drinking clean water everywhere you go. Another thing I liked about the filter is that there was absolutely no weird taste of after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I made for my every day items on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle... the water it filters tastes great so I don't even mind drinking it lukewarm. The compass and caribiner features are the best! It helped me navigate on my trip. For my small hands, the bottle is a little heavy with water, but that easily offsets how awesome this water bottle is... considering how long the filter for this water bottle lasts, I think this water bottle is one of the best purchases I made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eggplant cat

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: I am the type of person who hates regular tap water, as stupid as I know that is. This water bottle eliminates that problem for me, as it filters everything. It is nice and low key with the black and grey, it doesn’t leak, and it’s a really good size. Sometimes it feels a little difficult to pull from the straw because of the filter, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Just like use camelbak, when you first time use it, the first couple sips, you need to spir it out. After that water is tast fine. I drink a lot water every day, this bottle will pay for itself many times over. And thanks God, I don't need carry heavy water to home any more. It's make my life so much easy.
customer_reviews.author: Leona

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: It's not often I am impressed with a company but the company that makes this bottle is really great. I had some questions and they bent over backwards to provide answers. And as for the product, it looks great, feels great in hand is easy to use. Not only is it good for taking water on the go with you but the company has concentrated on filtering out dangerous water born bacteria if you are in an area with the potential risk. When a company is that responsible, you have to give them your respect.
customer_reviews.author: Book Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Get one today.
customer_reviews.text: The beauty of this product is for everyday use. At the park or workplace and travel. We take for granted that drinking water is safe to drink and it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Construction guy

customer_reviews.title: Awful, plastic taste and inability to suck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my upcoming trip to Walt Disney World to make Florida's infamously nasty tap water not taste horrendous. Well, I tested it out on my California tap water and the bottle made my tap water taste like...tap water. The bottle is nearly impossible to drink out of. I understand that filtered water bottles are typically harder to drink out of but this was exceptionally bad. Returned and bought a Brita.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bottle amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape of this bottle easy to carry around .. wide mouth is easy to wash n add ice.highly recommend . It’s the perfect size n such a good deal for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shalini devegowda

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle for hinking
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is very suitable for hiking. The filter allows you to drink clean waster by filling stream water when hiking. The compass can tell you the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the bottle and the filter. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G. Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Need air intake rubber seal.
customer_reviews.text: The tiny air intake gasket fell out the first time I used one of the bottles. Was unaware until leaking started. The other bottle worked great. Thank you SurviMate for sending an entire new complete bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does make a different
customer_reviews.text: I put tap water to the bottle and the favor turn out pure and taste good. Great recommend it. Great for hiking
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: worked
customer_reviews.text: worked great for my trip to india...i filered all my bottled water even...and was one of a few that never felt ill...
customer_reviews.author: suxiaxu

customer_reviews.title: Filter does not last
customer_reviews.text: Definitely didn’t last anywhere near eight months. Filter did not last two.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Enick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome product! Perfect for Hocking and live the charcoaled filter to make clean water.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Filter water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Good size and good to bring it around! I can drink the water in anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Recently used this for a trip to Peru. Put straight brown water in it and drank from the bottle the whole time with no problems and no tummy trouble at all. It's a little hard to pull from, so it's not ideal for taking vitamins and meds, etc. But meant I only had to use 1 bottled water per day and could stick to refilling this the rest of the time. My only complaint is that I wish it were bigger. The straw takes up a lot of room so it doesn't really hold much water in it and doesn't last long if you're trying to hike or be out away from refills for a while.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use it on my mission trip.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Not much use if one wishes to survive
customer_reviews.text: The cap leaked from the get-go. I sent it back almost immediately. Also, in addition to not being able to drink out of it due to its leaking, the positioning of the ‘straw’ was problematic.
customer_reviews.author: katz&dawgs

customer_reviews.title: Love the filter straw
customer_reviews.text: Love this filer straw! My kid drink a lot of water during sports. With this filter straw, we can refill water from the public water fountain as needed.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle, doesn't leak, easy to clean. I would definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Shrewsbury

customer_reviews.title: Instant clean water anywhere you go!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got back from a 3 week trip to southern India. Having this bottle with me was a lifesaver. I definitely filled it with water from 'questionable' sources but the water I drank from the bottle was always clean and tasted great! The instant filtration is such a plus. There's no need to wait for clean water or drop in a water cleaning tablet. I just used it like a standard water bottle and never had to worry about where the water was coming from. If I could give six stars I would - thank you SurviMate!
customer_reviews.author: alceryes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the water to taste good, but it didn't. And I even used filtered water. Plus, it is difficult for an older person to blow through the straw to empty the filter.
customer_reviews.author: michael foster

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from the start!
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to use it for my trip because it leaked as soon as i filled it up. I wanted to take this to my trip to the Bahamas especially to save on water and also to be able drink the water from the water fountains. As soon as i filled it up and put it in my carry on backpack it leaked every where. I was so disappointed. I need to find out how to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSilva

customer_reviews.title: It leaked all over my chest
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes fine. I personally find it challenging to suck water out of it and I’ve got a weak lung, so it’s hard for me to blow into the straw in order to have the filter release the water after every use. Overall I like the filtered water bottle, it’s nice. Thank you. Update: Bottle has been leaking all over
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Hubble can have the blue one!!!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle filters the water while, biking, hiking, backpacking as well any other activity you do! . You can fill the bottle with water from ponds, lakes, and streams. It is safe to drink with the filter inside it. I bought one a week ago for me. It was the next day, my husband wanted one. So, we bought our second. The only color left however was black. I made my husband promise I get the blue one! Well Black is pretty cool, I will take the black!
customer_reviews.author: Hope❤️

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for tap water
customer_reviews.text: I am the type of person who hates regular tap water. This water bottle eliminates that problem for me, as it filters everything. It is a nice light purple color that keeps my son from “borrowing” it..for some reason. It doesn’t leak, and it’s a really good size. At first it feels a little difficult to pull from the straw because of the filter, but once I got used to it, it wasn’t that hard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: My new mate everywhere I go!
customer_reviews.text: Chose this bottle after a long time research and really satisfied with my choice. I tried to drink water from river and I was fine the next days. No bad taste at all, such a pleasure to drink! Need to incline the bottle up to suck the water easier! No more harsh chlorine taste in my water too. The extra features make this filtered water bottle really convenient AF (compass and strap with carabiner)! Worth the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Gilliane

customer_reviews.title: Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bottle to use when I’m unable to get filtered water. On our recent road trip it was handy in our hotel rooms, etc. I don’t enjoy sucking up water through a straw (the filter) when I drink, but it’s better than not having clean water. And I like ice cold water rather than room temp but it recommends not using ice in the bottle to make the filter last longer. You must suck up and spit out quite a bit of water at the beginning to get the filter working right. Then it’s good to go and tastes good. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: SMcG

customer_reviews.title: Great in everyway except....
customer_reviews.text: People kept saying it's hard to suck on, it's not i think it's just people being bitchy lol, the bottle is great overall but there is a bit of a plastic taste, they say it'll go away with time so i don't know...but they can do better, a 2usd reusable cup from Starbucks didn't have any taste so there is no reason why This should...but overall a Good purchase and doesn't leak, it seems to filter my tap water but the plastic taste is preventing me from saying how well it does that..but overall it's a nice purchase
customer_reviews.author: Othmane

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle/filter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bottle, it seems very sturdy and well made and works as intended. 2 things I would say: the little gasket on the lid (see picture!) pops out very easily, and if it gets lost the bottle will leak, and I would like it to be a little bigger, but that's just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Keri and Steve

customer_reviews.title: What a Stingy Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: There is only one way to use it & that is to suck "5-7" times. If you're really thirsty this is frustrating! Have to depend on sucking-power, as tipping the bottle will cause water to annoyingly pour on you. And then on top of that, the water does not taste wonderful, clean and refreshing. I suppose it would be okay for survival purposes. Worst of all the water tastes musty. It tastes maybe like the filter. Sorry, but the price is way too high for all these negatives.
customer_reviews.author: LIBRARY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Great travel water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle was great to have on my trip to Peru. I was able to refill at every stop. Other reviewers complained that the bottle leaked, but it's not meant to be tipped up like a regular water bottle; you leave it upright and suck on the flip up straw to draw water up through the filtration cylinder. Yes, it requires a little effort, but well worth it, knowing you won't get sick from contaminated water. Better for the environment as well - eliminates the disposable plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lita K.

customer_reviews.title: NO.... just no
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my BF. He's an engineer and always carrying his water bottle around. So he is the ultimate test to the product. It can't handle anything.... a little heat and it shrunk. The filter portion also didn't seal well at all. I was pretty disappointed in it and had to return it in the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Brebot

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my travel abroad to a central America. I hated the run for mineral water. The water come out clean. If you can cool them ever better. The taste is funny the first couple of days but then it gets normal. It never leaked in my bag. I never got sick! I always had water from the hostel kitchen or bathroom and in hikes from rivers. It is hard to suck the water but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Shay BIALIK

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product. WAIST OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to order a replacement because the first one didn’t filter properly. It tastes horrible! I kept filtering water through it hoping it would wash out but I never did. I ordered a replacement and it was ok. You have to suck ridiculously hard to get any water through the straw. Water tasted great but the replacement only worked for a month. I’m not entirely sure what happened but I was no longer able to suck up water through the straw. All the attachments were on correctly but no suction was accruing. All that kept coming up the straw was air. Honestly was the biggest waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: darrell lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle in hopes to drink "clean water" since the water I have at work tastes off and unclean. I have used this water bottle for past 3-4 months and the taste of water is now off in a different way. When I read other reviews, people said it tasted clean but I have been tasting the taste of water filter ever since. I tried to ignore it and tell myself that it was only a temporary thing but it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting filtered water for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I brought this along when we went to Mexico. It was a lifesaver when we bottled water were not readily available. It does take a bit of time for water to be filtered through. That’s perfectly fine for us when we get peace of mind with the great tasting filtered water. Highly recommended for traveling to other countries.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: We did not like these water bottles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for me and my husband to take with us to Europe, however, I am returning them. Each time you want a sip you have to suck 5-6 times to get enough water to swallow. I felt like I was drinking through a straw that had a hole in it. It also had a funny "plastic" taste to me. I will simply take my chances with the water there and bring a couple of Tervis tumblers with us.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenRyszka

customer_reviews.title: Filter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the filter and based off of the reviews - but when I received it and tried to drink from the bottle, nothing came out. You really have to pull very hard to get even the tiniest bit of water through the filter. Unless I missed something but I have bought other water bottles with filters that worked just fine, this one was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bretz

customer_reviews.title: Keep an Eye on It
customer_reviews.text: We took 3 of these to Mexico. Only 2 made it back. Someone stole my son's bottle. Folks were eyeing it all week. It's durable and large. Worth the price. Difficult to get the water up the straw, but you get used to it. When we got home and cleaned it out, we noticed the color and strong sulphur smell from the filter. We couldn't tell how well the bottle was working in Mexico, until we got home and cleaned it out. I'll order another 1.
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: durable and lightweight And great filter
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is made of good quality material. It is durable and lightweight. Easy to carry around. We filled it with some stream water at camping site, it filtered out all the bad smell and we could dink it off the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes like a plastic balloon.  Really gross!!
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes like a balloon. Plastic chemical awful taste. I thought maybe give it some time but no it is still really bad testing.
customer_reviews.author: Spoonfulofsugar

customer_reviews.title: Read the instruction for cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: I know this bottle is more for traveling, camping, hiking, ect.. but I like using when I go to the gym or at work. My only recommendation is to read the instructions on how to clean the bottle and filter (read the white piece of paper that's inserted in the bottle).
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Good filter
customer_reviews.text: I needed a filtered water bottle for domestic and internal business trips - safe water. I choose this based on the quality of the filter - i wanted multistage and for it to list what it filters. It does take a bit of suction to get the water out - but not so much that its a chore. It is not too large and fits in my back pack bottle holder nicely. No leaks. You do have to drain it and reverse blow the filter before putting it away. I
customer_reviews.author: Tesla

customer_reviews.title: If you love chewing rocks...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and she won't even try to use it anymore. Even after spitting out an entire container of water, there's STILL charcoal bits in almost every mouthful. It's SO disappointing. I wish I'd gone with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Bad Odor
customer_reviews.text: I tried to clean this water bottle but the odor still in the bottle. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes fatiguing to use
customer_reviews.text: Since the filter requires you to suck the water up through it, there is a considerable amount of effort required to do so. I would not recommend this for a daily water bottle, but for emergency use or hikes it's probably fine. Consider this, your mouth is having to do all the work that normally the force of gravity does.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Have a sip out of the creek, see what direction north is, a plus
customer_reviews.text: I love this water filter, especially if you are in the woods without a gallon of fresh water, at least this will allow a cool sip of mountain water without worry of microorganisms or worms getting in your digestive tract. Good deal for sure. Clean, no wasted water bottles and an accurate compass was a pleasing surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I hike a lot. This bottle just give an extra security if I run out of water. I replaced a regular same size bottle with this one. The little compass on the lid is also a nice add-on feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, taste is awful, had to suck so make more work out of drinking the water and was pricey so sent it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with defective filter
customer_reviews.text: Water bottle works well and does not leak if tipped. The reason for my 3 star review, is because the filter inside fell apart after 1 month of use. I only used it for water, and nothing else. Now I have to order another filter, and these things aren't cheap. Was really hoping the filter would have lasted longer than it it did.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Olivas

customer_reviews.title: I am not polluting the earth with so many plastic water bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing this item. There were many comments about how difficult it is to suck the water through the straw. I DO NOT AGREE WITH THIS AT ALL! It is not difficult to suck the water through the straw at all. I love that I am not buying bottled water any longer. This is a great water filtration system and I will use this forever!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D. Marcoux

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for what ia needed. It is durable, it has a compass, and it's clip allows you to hook it to a bag or backpack. I don't believe it cleans all the pathogens or things Lifestraw does, as I saw life straw had a few morw on the desceiption, but it is easy to suck through, and it is grwat for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fields

customer_reviews.title: give it time.
customer_reviews.text: I like drinking water that has no taste. I like my water wet and refreshing, nothing else. This product provides that.......after a few fill ups. Out of the box the water had a strong plastic taste. This is expected. Once you’ve cycled a few bottles through everything is fine. I can’t think of anything bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these water bottles and I love them! I keep one at work, one home and the 3rd one where ever I may need it. I love it and I am not using so much plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D. Marcoux

customer_reviews.title: Good product but ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has one major hiccup ....... pulling on the straw is quite discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filter was Malfuntioning
customer_reviews.text: The overall bottle was easy to use, but the filter that came with mine didn't work how it was supposed to. It made the water taste metallic and bitter, and it tasted awful. I tried cleaning it out and everything, and nothing worked. After I took the filter out, the water tasted fine, but the bottle obviously wasn't going to filter the water. It just worked as a regular water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyn

customer_reviews.title: Filter great, kind of hard to suck the water out
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I went backpacking and used all different types of water and never got sick and the water tasted just fine. It is a little hard to suck out of the straw which is why I only gave it 4 stars. It kind of makes your cheeks hurt from having to work so hard to get the water. But the filter seems to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: TMugg

customer_reviews.title: Cool filter
customer_reviews.text: I like that this bottle has a small compass and that it has a working filter for the price it is worth it. I like that you can choose different colors and that the filter can be replaced easily.
customer_reviews.author: Zod

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this water bottle for my trip to the boundary waters between Minnesota and Canada. We were canoeing and doing long portages between lakes to get to our campsite, so carrying water was out of the question. This bottle performed great! I would recommend this item for any outdoor adventure type of person!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for spot
customer_reviews.text: It is convenient for me when I go to play basketball . I normally carry 3-4 bottles of water with me . With this filter water bottle , i can get water anywhere without carrying lots of water. Only Suggestion is washing it couple times before using it so the plastic smells will go away!
customer_reviews.author: Louie Chen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to suck
customer_reviews.text: While the water quality is good but it's pretty difficult to suck water up through the filter. I was hoping that it would be a gravity flow rather than a suck up model.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a three week trip through Eastern Europe, great thing to have a long, able to routinely fill it from any facet without worry. After the first couple of bottles, I thought the taste was fine. It does take a little suction power, but you have to get it through the filter.
customer_reviews.author: TSan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on paper, but not sure if useful/safe for everyday usage.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I would like the product more if I was more of an outdoors man (I use it for everyday use due to my tap water having a bad taste). My biggest issue with this is there is a bit of a chemical taste, especially during very first usage when refilling and using. Is this product truly safe to drink all of the time?
customer_reviews.author: Adam Louden

customer_reviews.title: Works great for school
customer_reviews.text: Bought to eliminate off taste from public drinking fountain in school. Daughter said water tastes normal now with no after taste. For reference we are on private well water at home and school is public municipal water supply.
customer_reviews.author: SapphireMoon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!save lot of money:)
customer_reviews.text: I don't taste flouride or anything in my water i actually taste clean filtered water ..i will upgrade to a grayl later this year but i see no reason to so far ..i might buy another in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Sam.W

customer_reviews.title: Works and easy to fill.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. I took it backpacking through asia and didnt get travelers diarrhea like last time so I guess it worked.. at least better than my camelpak with filter and bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Vole

customer_reviews.title: Great option for terrible water
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle. Wanted something better than britta. No flavor from crappy water out of the faucet. Only thing I would say is the mouth piece could be better. Its pretty small and square so its a little uncomfortable. As expected takes a bit to get the water and you get quite a few bubbles if you try to go fast.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright I guess 🤷🏽‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to drink from because the Mouthey piece doesn’t connect directly to the filter straw, there is a fitting but it’s not a good sealed fit that allows for good suction. I guess it’s better than nothing in a survival scenario
customer_reviews.author: Honni A.

customer_reviews.title: Be conservation minded and healthy.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it a 4 star on flavor because I have only used town water in it and it does take out the chlorine taste. I have a cruise coming up and can only drink spring water so this has helped with have to buy bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Paula V.

customer_reviews.title: Clean water on mountain bike trips
customer_reviews.text: Daughter and I took on a short mountain bike trip. It was fun to drink from the river. Water came out with no taste, unit was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Girls

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle. We've used it on several hikes and it provides fresh clean water. We purchased for our trip to alaska but use it during casual hiking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product to use when outside
customer_reviews.text: This purified water bottle is very easy to use. Since it also comes a clip it is also easy to carry. It great to know that we have filtered water when we go out camping. However at first when you taste it, it can seem that it’s not filtered so I usually spit it out. But the good overlap the bad. It’s convenient when we go out somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Yanbing zhu

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This was expensive and worked for one day, we bought two for our 13 days in Kipkarren Kenya Africa and after on day use had nothing but expensive empty containers
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to suck from. Hopefully does a good job of keeping bacteria out although I wouldn’t know unless it doesn’t work. Tough to clean. But they are easily transportable.
customer_reviews.author: SarahSashley42

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure
customer_reviews.text: I’m worried, I tried with the water in my apartment. The water has a medicament taste. So I filled the water in the filtered water and I have the same taste! Medicament! So are we sure that it does a good job?
customer_reviews.author: Sandrine Connan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like having filters water all the time without buying bottled. It’s a little hard to suck when you first fill it but other than that I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Carol Iovino

customer_reviews.title: Great for international travel, I would trust 100% in recreational use outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: I used this solely in China with exception of fountain drinks, coffee, or boozy drinks. The water I soley filtered even at my resort. I sanitized the lid and bottle frequently with hot soapy water. Great for international travel and I would trust 100% in recreational use outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: There was a taste when first drinking. It is hard to suck the water out. Other than that, the product seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: My favorite water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This cup has a large capacity to hold a lot of water to keep me hydrated. My boyfriend said I don't drink enough water, so I decided to get this cup because I can take it with me everywhere. I can refill with tap water because of the built in filter. Very good feature most other cups don't have. It's great quality BPA free!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a wise purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for travel to developing countries. Although we were provided bottled water at all sites I poured it into this filtered bottle. There was definitely a much better taste than directly from the bottled water. In addition to enjoying clean tasting water I was enamored with the little compass in the lid of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the bottle, I can now drink my well water without the bad smell and taste of iron will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great filter removes all the harmful impurities
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a filter that's far advanced than just removing chlorine and improving taste. The filter actually removes the harmful additives and deposits in tap water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter bottle
customer_reviews.text: After buying Grayl and Brita bottles, I ended up settling with SurviMate. Yesterday, I received my bottle and today I began using it. So far, so good. No complaints. It looks very sturdy - and it's very easy to use. Some people are complaining that it is very difficult to suck water from the straw, but I had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: lastores

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s supposed to. I wish it had a hole and a slider to cover it so that I wouldn’t have to unscrew the entire top with filter attached, in order to refill it.
customer_reviews.author: SJMARTIN

customer_reviews.title: filtering water bottle is good Idea  for use outside
customer_reviews.text: I like this filtered water bottle very much. It is a good idea for filtering water outside . Very convenient design. and water is good tasting , clean . Easy to use the water straw . I will order for my family and friends as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water bottle, sipping out of it is ok, but you must prime it before the water will flow out. I would buy it again especially for knowing that it rids the water of so many things.
customer_reviews.author: Millette L. Witte

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I’m weird about drinking tap water so I got this water bottle initially to use on a camping trip. I like it so much that I use it every day now! The only thing that would make it better is if it kept liquids cold, but other than that one function everything else works exactly how they describe!
customer_reviews.author: Dre Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very effective water filter
customer_reviews.text: I took this to thailand on a note that thai water is not clean, and i drank the tap in my hotel through this bottle with no problems to my health with this. I drank water anytime i needed and beats buying water at the store everytime. So this gives you peace of mind and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joel C

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with this water bottle in China. The bottle leaked EVERYWHERE! I contacted the seller, and I had a new product at the house ready for my trip to Thailand. Super excited. The new one works great! Thanks for having superb customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I used it in Cuba for a week with no problems. But, when I got home and blew out the filter, it popped off and carbon went everywhere. Not happy about having to buy a new filter after 1 week of use :-(
customer_reviews.author: kruyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a camping trip and so glad I did. Came quickly and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy reducing plastic and water taste great . I take it every place I go. Takes out the chlorine taste in city water.saves me money on buying bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Paula V.

customer_reviews.title: Filter works great
customer_reviews.text: I have well water and don't like the taste, I bought this hoping I could use it to reduce my consumption of single use water bottles, since I have had it I have not had to use one other bottle of water. It filters the water perfectly , it dose take a little effort to get the water through the filter but it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Inefficient straw action
customer_reviews.text: The straw is a hard pull. Requires too much muscle strength to suck the water up.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t kill off bacteria, buy clean tabs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I thought I needed to live in the woods away from everyone, tested it out on a mud puddle, got sick. Took away the flavor. I use it now as an everyday drink bottle.
customer_reviews.author: samuel hemple

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: When in doubt about water quality, I do not fret it because I have confidence that this Water filter bottle will do the job. Recommend it for quality & cost factor.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: The size fits my school bag very well. There is no strange flavor as other bottles as usual, and the weight is light enough to be carried everywhere with daily life. The most important thing, it filters the water, makes me feels safer with the water I am drinking.
customer_reviews.author: poemu

product_meta.title: Survimate Filtered Water Bottle BPA Free with 4-Stage Intergrated Filter Straw for Camping, Hiking, Backpacking and Travel
feature_bullets: 【Advanced purification System 】: Survimate water bottles have 4 advanced high-performance purify installed, they are: Medical Grade Hollow Fiber Membrane, Coconut Shell Activated Carbon, Beads and Medical Grade PP Cotton
【Safe Like Baby Bottle】: Survimate Bottles are made from Food Grade Tritan Copolyester, without any bad smell, it's BPA-free, heat resisting and extremely durable
【Long Lifespan & Replaceable 】: No need to worry about replacing straw for up to 1500L/year of continuous usage. Replaceable straw save you money as the water bottles themselves have a very long life

【Ultimate Wilderness Survival Assistant】: This versatile water bottle not only helps providing healthy, drinkable water in harsh outdoor conditions, but will help you to find direction using the built-in compass on the top
【Instant Fresh Water】: Just fill up the bottle and drink. Nothing could be simpler - no pumps or hoses, no squeezing, no batteries or bulbs, Only sip 5 to 8 times to get clean water
